citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:55am on
19-Sep-16.
Contact was made with an individual at the facility and it was relayed that the licensee was not available at that time
to accompany the inspectors during the inspection process.
Additional Inspectors
Hicks Beverly, Animal Care Inspector
